ここ最近、ザルトゥーム学園中がにわかに活気づいていた。\n俺が呼び出された校舎―:
Lately, the whole of Zarthum Academy has been suddenly lively.
The building I was summoned to—LOC—was no exception
この程度の仕掛けじゃ、とても看板を背負わせられないわ！\nよそのチームの出店にお:
I can't carry a sign on my back with a mechanism like this!
We're going to lose our customers to another team's food stall!
お化け屋敷の内装は拘るべきだよ～！\nもっと、派手にしてさー！ 見たら腰を抜かす:
We should focus on the interior of the haunted house!
Make it even flashier! Enough to make me lose my nerve when I see it!
ちょっと！ こんなグラフィックじゃ満足できないわよ！\nもっとモデリングも拘って:
Hey! I can't be satisfied with graphics like this!
We need to focus on modeling and aim for the best VR experience possible!
（あちこちの教室で怒号が飛び交ってるな……\nこりゃもう、楽しいイベントって雰囲:
(There's shouting all over the classroom...)
This doesn't feel like a fun event anymore.)
（話には聞いてたが、ここまで殺伐とするものなのか……\nまあ、ＬＯＣがクリエイタ:
(I'd heard about it, but I didn't know it was this brutal...)
Well, I guess there's also the fact that LOC has the temperament of a creator.)
おお、待たせたなフルート。: Oh, sorry to keep you waiting, flute.
いえいえ！\n今日はわざわざ来てくださってあざまるです！:
No, no, no!
Thank you for coming all the way here today!
でも珍しいね。\n%usernameusernameuserna%が約束の時間ギ:
But it's rare.
I can't believe %usernameusernameuserna% arrived just before the appointed time.
悪いな。\n思ってた以上に校舎中が混んでたからさ。:
Sorry about that.
The whole building was more crowded than I thought.
学園祭だからみんな張り切ってるのよ。\n大きなイベントだし、クリエイティブ精神の:
It's the school festival, so everyone's really excited.
It's a big event, and it's where you can show off your creative spirit.
流石にリモート講義が中心のＬＯＣで、\nこんなにも人と物で溢れかえってるなんて想:
Unsurprisingly, it was a LOC centered around remote lectures
I never imagined it would be so full of people and things...
あはは。\nやっぱりイベントが近いとなると、みんな熱が入るんだね。:
Ahaha.
If the event is coming up soon, everyone must be really fired up.
効率に見合わない労力をつぎ込んでるチームも多いみたい。\n別に儲かるわけじゃない:
Looks like a lot of teams are putting in effort that doesn't match their efficiency.
It's not like we're making a profit or anything, but everyone does it a lot.
ふふ、エヴィちゃんは相変わらずね。\n折角のイベントくらいは張り切ってやるのもい:
Heehee. You never change, do you, Eve?
Isn't it nice to at least be enthusiastic about an event?
その通りです。せっかくの楽しい行事なんですから、\nみんなテンアゲでいきましょう:
Exactly. It's a fun event, after all.
Let's all go with tenage!
アゲていくのはいいが……\nチームメンバーでもない俺が、どうしてここへ呼ばれたん:
I don't mind if you do, but...
Why was someone like me, who wasn't even a team member, called here?
ええっと……それは、学園祭に関する話なんです。\nフルートたちだけだと決め切れな:
Let's see... It's about the school festival.
I couldn't decide it was just the flutes...
まあ、説明すると『出し物』が決まらないんだよね。: Well, to explain, we can't decide what to do for the festival.
……なるほど？\nでも、学園祭の出し物ってそんなに重要なのか？:
...I see?
But is the school festival event really that important?
まあ、儲かったり直接的な得があるわけじゃないね\nでも、チームとしてのアピールに:
Well, it's not like there's any profit or direct benefit to it.
But I wonder if it'll be enough to appeal to her as a team.
一番人気のチームは表彰されたりもするわよ！\nでも、何よりも出し物がウケて楽しん:
The most popular team will even get an award!
But more than anything, I'm sure you'd be happy if you enjoyed the show♪
なるほど……いや、他のチームはもう準備を始めてたよな？\n流石に他に比べて出だし:
I see... No, the other teams have already started preparing, haven't they?
Isn't it a little later than the others?
は、はい……そうなんです。\n実は色々と考えてたんですけど意見がまとまらなくて…:
Y-Yes... That's right.
Actually, I've been thinking about a lot of things, but I can't come to an agreement...
どうかフルート達に力を貸してください！\nフルートたちの出し物を最高にアゲでぽよ:
Please lend your strength to the flutes!
To make the flute's performance the best possible thing to do with bruises!
……まあ、事情は分かった。\nずっと話してたなら方向性くらいは決まってないのか？:
...Well, I understand the situation.
If you've been talking this whole time, have you at least decided on a direction?
いやあ、意見自体は出てるんだけどね。\nそこから先が全然まとまってなくてさぁ。:
Well, I've got my own opinions, though.
Everything from that point on hasn't come together at all.
皆、色々とやりたい事はあるんだけどね……\nだから、%usernameusern:
There's a lot we all want to do, though...
That's why I want to rely on %usernameusernameuserna%.
うう……このままだと、文化祭で出し物が用意できなくて、\n空っぽの教室でぴえんな:
Ugh... At this rate, I wouldn't be able to prepare anything for the cultural festival
I'm going to end up broadcasting in an empty classroom...!
せっかくの学園行事で、それは虚しいな……\nそれで、どんなアイデアが出てるんだ？:
Now that it's a school event, that's kind of pointless...
So, what's your idea?
ふふふ、もうやりたいことがありすぎるくらいよ！\nじゃあまずはあたしのアイデアか:
Hehehe, there's so much I want to do now!
Then I'll start with my idea!
あたしは溢れんばかりの着想を活かして、個展を開きたいの。\n教室を丸ごと新作発表:
I want to use my overflowing ideas to hold an exhibition.
Make the whole classroom the venue for the new recital!
ロージーが作ったアートの展示会か……\n面白そうな企画じゃないか。:
An art exhibition made by Rosie, huh?
Isn't that an interesting plan?
ロージーちゃんの個展、とってもヤバですね！\nエモな感じで飾り付けてぽよな出し物:
Rosie's exhibition is really bad!
It looks like it's going to be a big show, decorated with emo!
なら、ロージーの個展で出し物は決定するか？: In that case, will Rosie's exhibition decide what to do?
いやいや、ただ観賞するだけの空間じゃ物足りない。\n時代は体験型アトラクションだ:
No, no, just looking at it isn't enough.
Times are a trial-and-error attraction!
レイラのアイデアか。\n体験型アトラクションってどんなものなのだ？:
Leila's idea, huh?
What's a trial attraction like?
そうだね、ＶＲでお化け屋敷なんてどうかな？\nほら、時期的にもハロウィンのタイミ:
Yeah, how about a haunted house in VR?
Look, it's Halloween timing, too.
おー、お化け屋敷……お祭りらしくてよきですね！\nお客さんたちもアゲアゲで盛り上:
Ooh, a haunted house... It's nice and festive!
It looks like the customers are going to get excited with Ageha too♪
最新技術を駆使したアトラクションなら、話題性もある。\nそういう方向性も面白そう:
If it's an attraction that uses state-of-the-art technology, there's a lot of talk about it.
That kind of direction sounds interesting, too.
ええっと……私はせっかくチームで何かするなら、\nみんなと一緒に演劇か何かをやっ:
Let's see... If we're going to do something as a team,
I'd like to do a play or something with everyone.
むむ、それもわかりみが深いです！\n全員が目立って活躍できますから素敵ですね！:
Hmm, that's pretty obvious, too!
It's wonderful that everyone can stand out so much!
まあ、台本や舞台を用意する大変さもあるが……\n全員が平等に楽しめるという意味な:
Well, it's hard to prepare the script and the stage, but...
If it means that everyone can enjoy themselves equally, that's fine.
（ずいぶん困ってる様子だったから、正直不安だったが……\nみんな意外とちゃんとし:
(She looked pretty troubled, so I was honestly worried, but...)
Everyone's coming up with a surprisingly good plan.)
……他人事みたいな顔をしてるエヴィだが、\n何かやりたいものはないのか？:
...Evie looked like it had nothing to do with her, but...
Is there anything you want to do?
準備の手間もかからないし、当日も楽そうだからね。\n撮影スポットと適当なお菓子を:
It won't take much preparation, and it'll be easy on the day of.
Wouldn't it be a good idea to prepare a photo spot and some snacks to talk to each other about?
エヴィらしいな……まあ、でも確かに他が張り切る分、\nそういうのもありか……？:
That's just like Eve... Well, it's true that the others are all fired up about it
Is that even possible...?
んー、休憩所だと結局は他の出し物頼りになるし……\nそれに、あたし達っぽさがない:
Hmm, in the rest area, we'll be able to rely on other attractions...
Besides, it doesn't really feel like us at all.
まあ、でも悪くはないと思うよ？\nただ、盛り上がりって面では欠けるかもなぁ。:
Well, I don't think it's bad, though.
But I don't think it's enough to liven things up.
時間が足りないなら、休憩所でおもてなしもありかも？\nアマツだとそういう文化があ:
If we don't have enough time, maybe we can have some hospitality at the rest area?
I heard there's a culture like that in Amatsu.
それぞれが意見を言ってからディスカッションが始まる。: The discussion began after each of us voiced our opinions.
じゃあ、ここはやっぱり個展よね！\n見る人を飽きさせない作品を準備しましょう！:
Then this really is an exhibition!
Let's prepare a work that will never tire anyone who sees it!
うーん。みんなで演劇とか、記憶に残るような、\nそんな出し物をしたいなぁって思う:
Hmm. It's something we can all remember, like a play.
I want to do something like that, but...
いやいや、ここはやっぱりお化け屋敷だよ！\nＶＲで最先端の話題性をバッチリ掴んで:
No, no, this really is a haunted house!
We've got the most cutting-edge topic in VR, and we're going to get a thousand customers!
私としては何でもいいんだけどね～。\nまあ、大変過ぎない程度でお願い。:
As far as I'm concerned, I don't really care.
Well, please don't overdo it.
ですです……こんな感じでわちゃわちゃになるんですよね……\nどれを取ってもいい意:
That's right... This is how it gets all messed up...
It's a good opinion, so I don't know what to say...
いい感じに意見がまとまらないって訳か……: So you can't come to a good consensus...
他のチームは企画を決めてどんどん先へ進んでるので、\nフルート達だけずっと足踏み:
The other teams have already decided on a plan and are moving on.
It's dangerous for the flutes to be the only ones to keep stepping on them...
まあ、比べても焦っても仕方ないだろ？\nフルートたちのペースで進めていけばいいさ:
Well, there's no point in comparing them or getting impatient, is there?
We'll just have to keep going at the flutes' pace.
ふふ、後輩クンの仕切りは助かるわね。\nそれじゃあ、本格的に決めて行きましょうか:
Heehee. I'm glad you're in charge, Kouhai-kun.
Well then, let's make a serious decision!
まずはさっきの意見を踏まえて、それぞれ検討するか。: Guess I'll start by considering each of them based on their earlier opinions.
実現可能かどうかも大切だが……\n全員が納得して出来るかどうかも重要だよな。:
It's important to know if it's possible or not, but...
It's important to see if everyone can accept it.
ロージーの個展だと、ロージー頼りになるからなぁ。\n他のメンバーがやる事が減った:
When it comes to Rosie's exhibition, I can always count on her.
Won't the other members have less to do?
そうねー。確かにそういう側面はあるわよね。\n裏方としてやること自体は沢山あるん:
That's right. There's definitely a side to that.
There's a lot I have to do as a backer, but...
トレブルクインテットの皆とやるのに、\nあたしだけの個展っていうのはちょっと違う:
I'm going to do it with everyone in Treburg-Intedt.
It's a little different from a solo exhibition just for me.
お化け屋敷は逆に、個性って面では薄くないか？: A haunted house, on the other hand, isn't it a little lacking in individuality?
まあ、確かにそうだねぇ……ＶＲでお化け屋敷っていうのは、\n他のチームでも出来る:
Well, that's true... A haunted house in VR is...
It's the kind of idea that other teams can come up with.
俺が来るときもお化け屋敷とかＶＲを準備をしてるのは見たからな。\n結構競争という:
I saw her preparing a haunted house and VR when I came, after all.
Isn't it hard to compete in terms of competition?
確かにねぇ。立地的な面で優ってるわけじゃないし……\nビジネスだったら撤退判断し:
That's true. It's not like we're superior in location...
If it were a business, I'd probably decide to withdraw.
まあ、学園祭だしビジネスなわけじゃないからな。\nそこは楽しくやればいいと思うぞ:
Well, it's a school festival, so it isn't a business.
I think you should have fun there.
んー、まあそれはそうだね。\nそういう意味だと私がやってみたいのも大きいんだよね:
Hmm, well, that's true.
In that sense, it's a big reason I want to try it.
シエナの方は……演劇か。\n一番準備にお金も手間もかからないんじゃないか？:
As for Siena... A play, huh?
Wouldn't it take the least amount of money and effort to prepare?
んー、そんなことはないわよ？\n知り合いが演劇をやってるんだけど……:
Hmm, that's not true, okay?
An acquaintance of mine is performing a play...
舞台の準備に衣装を揃えるでしょ？\nそれに、台本の読み合わせに……やる事も手間も:
You're going to get your costumes ready for the stage, right?
Besides, it takes a lot of time and effort to read the script...
まあ、でもその分はやり遂げると楽しそうだけどね。\nそれにフルートとシエナで知名:
Well, it looks like it'll be fun to make up for it.
Besides, she's famous for her flute and siena.
シエナは良いのか？\nあんまり目立つのは好きじゃないだろ？:
Are you okay with Siena?
You don't like to stand out too much, do you?
確かに、あんまり目立ちたくはないけど……\n皆で一緒にこういう事をやるならいいか:
True, I don't want to stand out too much, but...
I thought it would be nice if we could all do this together.
なるほど……それに、劇なら役としてなり切れるから、\n普段の自分と違う自分になれ:
I see... Besides, if it's a play, I can play the part, so...
They say you can be different from your normal self.
それもあるかな……お芝居ってちょっと興味はあるし。\nでも、思ったより大変そうな:
I guess that's part of it... I'm a little interested in acting.
But it seems like it's harder than I thought... It's hard.
ああ、確かに悩ましいな……\nどれが一番良いって言えるような決め手もないしな。:
Yeah, it's definitely a problem...
I don't have the decisiveness to say which is the best.
（……それと、気がかりがひとつあるんだよな）: (...And there's one more thing I'm worried about.)
（さっきからフルートが妙に大人しいんだよな。\n普段のフルートなら、もっと自分か:
(The flute has been strangely docile for a while now.
Normally, a flute would be able to give its own opinion...)
（チームの皆を引っ張るフルートらしさを感じられない。\n……何か、あったんだろう:
(I don't feel like a flute pulling everyone on the team.
...Did something happen?)
%usernameusernameuserna%くん、また難しい顔してるよ～？: %usernameusernameuserna%-kun, you're making a complicated face again~
ごめんなさいね、面倒事を押しつけちゃって。\nチームだけで決めれたらよかったんだ:
I'm sorry for pushing all the trouble onto you.
It would have been nice if the team could decide on their own, but...
ああいや、他に考え事をしてただけだから気にしないでくれ。: Oh no, I was just thinking about something else, so don't worry about it.
とりあえず、意見は聞けたからな。\n一旦休憩をしよう。その後に集まってもう一回話:
At any rate, I was able to get her opinion.
Let's take a break. We'll meet up after that and talk again.
おっけー。私もあんまり決まらない会議が続くと、\nタイパもコスパも悪いなーって思:
Okay. I don't have a lot of meetings to decide on either, so...
I was thinking about how bad Tipa and Cospa are.
じゃ、私は今のうちに何か食べてこようかなー。: Well then, I guess I'll go get something to eat while I still can.
それならみんなで昼食に――: Then let's all have lunch together――
おっと。\nすまないが、フルートはちょっと残ってくれ。:
Whoops.
I'm sorry, but could you stay a little longer on the flute?
少し付き合ってほしいんだ。\nふたりで大事な話がしたくてな。:
I want you to go out with me for a bit.
I wanted to talk to you about something important.
ふたりきりで、大事なお話……ですか……？: An important conversation... just the two of us...?
じゃ、私達は先に行ってるから。: Well, we'll be going on ahead.
時間をとらせて悪いな。\nどうしてもフルートの気持ちを聞いておかなきゃと思って。:
Sorry to take up your time.
I thought I had to ask how the flute felt.
なるべく人の来ない静かな場所がいいんだが……\nどこかあるかな。:
I'd prefer a quiet place with as few people as possible...
I wonder where it is.
みんなの前じゃ話しづらいだろうから。: It'll be hard to talk in front of everyone.
み、みんなの前ではできないお話……は、はわわ……！？: I-It's something I can't talk about in front of everyone... H-Hawawa...!?
……上のフロアには、人が利用してる教室はないみたいだな。\nよし。ついて来てくれ:
...Looks like there aren't any classrooms on the upper floor that people are using.
All right. Follow me.
ひゃ、ひゃい！？ わ、わかりました！？\nま、まさか%usernameusern:
H-Hyai?! D-Do you understand?!
D-Don't tell me %usernameusernameuserna%...
